thread.title: Little Paris Gem(small exception)
thread.title_full: Little Paris Gem(small exception) - Review of Hotel Parc St. Severin - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: lisahO7795JH
title: Little Paris Gem(small exception)
text: This is one of my favourite hotels in Paris - it is an absolute gem - the breakfast is amazing, the decor lovely, location great and staff fantastic with the small exception of one male employee that was downright rude to me and my mother during our stay. BUT everything else is FANTASTIC so I would still recommend the hotel.
